rooms.Name: The Theater Entrance
rooms.Description:
You stand before a large theater waiting to get in.  The line slowly moves
through the large double doors taking you inside.  You notice that the
people standing around you look kind of different.  You realize that you
are surrounede my muppets!

rooms.Name: The Sidewalk
rooms.Description:
You travel down a sidewalk towards an old theater.  You hear the sounds of
music and laughter coming from the north and think that there must be
something going on inside.

rooms.Name: The Sidewalk
rooms.Description:
You travel down a sidewalk towards an old theater.  You hear the sounds of
music and laughter coming from the northwest and think that there must be
something going on inside.

rooms.Name: Inside the Theater
rooms.Description:
You are in a seemingly endless sea of muppets!  It appears that almost all
of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Name: Inside the Theater
rooms.Description:
You are in a seemingly endless sea of muppets!  It appears that almost all
of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Name: Inside the Theater
rooms.Description:
You are in a seemingly endless sea of muppets!  It appears that almost all
of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Description:

of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Description:

of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Description:
You are in a seemingly endless sea of muppets!  It appears that almost all
of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Description:

of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Description:
You are in a seemingly endless sea of muppets!  It appears that almost all
of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Description:
You are in a seemingly endless sea of muppets!  It appears that almost all
of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Name: Inside the Theater
rooms.Description:
You are in a seemingly endless sea of muppets!  It appears that almost all
of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Name: Inside the Theater
rooms.Description:
You are in a seemingly endless sea of muppets!  It appears that almost all
of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Name: Inside the Theater
rooms.Description:
You are in a seemingly endless sea of muppets!  It appears that almost all
of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Name: Inside the Theater
rooms.Description:
You are in a seemingly endless sea of muppets!  It appears that almost all
of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Name: Inside the Theater
rooms.Description:
You are in a seemingly endless sea of muppets!  It appears that almost all
of the dark red seats of the theater are taken.  To the north you see the
bright lights of the stage and to the south is the main exit to the theater.
the laugh of distant hecklers can also be heard from somewhere to the east.

rooms.Name: The Stairs
rooms.Description:
The dark red carpet of the theater leads up to a set of stairs derectly in front
of you.  The sounds of music and people laughing can be heard from the west.
The sounds of laughter are even louder from above.

rooms.Name: Up The Stairs
rooms.Description:
You travel up the carpeted metal stair case wondering where it leads to.  The
sounds of your feet hitting the hollow metal stairs echo throught the the
room.  You realize that you must go up another flight in order to reach the
top.

rooms.Name: At the Top of the Stairs
rooms.Description:
A large wooden door is at the end of the stairs.  From the other side of it
you can hear what seems like old men laughing.  Out of curiousity you think
it might be a good idea to see what is so funny.

rooms.Name: The Box
rooms.Description:
You now overlook the theater.  You are in a small box with red velvet walls
which surround the theater side at about waist level.  Behind you the giant
wall of the theater extends up to the molded plaster ceiling.  You hear the
laughing and heckling of the two old men seated in front of you.

rooms.Name: The Orchestra Pit
rooms.Description:
You are inside a pit which is painted entirely in black.  It is surrounded
by a gold railing and is has small walls.  The conductor gives you an
evil look as you wander through his orchestra.

rooms.Name: The Orchestra Pit
rooms.Description:
You are inside a pit which is painted entirely in black.  It is surrounded
by a gold railing and is has small walls.  The conductor gives you an
evil look as you wander through his orchestra.

rooms.Name: The Orchestra Pit
rooms.Description:
You are inside a pit which is painted entirely in black.  It is surrounded
by a gold railing and is has small walls.  The conductor gives you an
evil look as you wander through his orchestra.

rooms.Name: The Orchestra Pit
rooms.Description:
You are inside a pit which is painted entirely in black.  It is surrounded
by a gold railing and is has small walls.  The conductor gives you an
evil look as you wander through his orchestra.

rooms.Name: The Orchestra Pit
rooms.Description:
You are inside a pit which is painted entirely in black.  It is surrounded
by a gold railing and is has small walls.  The conductor gives you an
evil look as you wander through his orchestra.

rooms.Name: The Orchestra Pit
rooms.Description:
You are inside a pit which is painted entirely in black.  It is surrounded
by a gold railing and is has small walls.  The conductor gives you an
evil look as you wander through his orchestra.

rooms.Name: The Orchestra Pit
rooms.Description:
You are inside a pit which is painted entirely in black.  It is surrounded
by a gold railing and is has small walls.  The conductor gives you an
evil look as you wander through his orchestra.

rooms.Name: The Orchestra Pit
rooms.Description:
You are inside a pit which is painted entirely in black.  It is surrounded
by a gold railing and is has small walls.  The conductor gives you an
evil look as you wander through his orchestra.

rooms.Name: The Stairs to the Stage
rooms.Description:
The dark red carpet of the theater leads up the stairs and stops at the
edge of the wooden stage.  Three or four stairs to the north lead up to
the stage.  From below you can hear the trombones crank out the beginning
to the main theme of the show.  The house of the theater is to the south.

rooms.Name: The Stairs to the Stage
rooms.Description:
The dark red carpet of the theater leads up the stairs and stops at the
edge of the wooden stage.  Three or four stairs to the north lead up to
the stage.  From below you can hear the trombones crank out the beginning
to the main theme of the show.  The house of the theater is to the south.

rooms.Name: The Stage
rooms.Description:
As the bright lights beam down on you the show continues.  A variety of acts
come on and off of the stage as you make your way around.  To the south is
the house of the theater and backstage is to the west.

rooms.Name: The Stage
rooms.Description:
As the bright lights beam down on you the show continues.  A variety of acts
come on and off of the stage as you make your way around.  To the south is
the house of the theater and backstage is to the west.

rooms.Name: The Stage
rooms.Description:
As the bright lights beam down on you the show continues.  A variety of acts
come on and off of the stage as you make your way around.  To the south is
the house of the theater and backstage is to the west.

rooms.Name: The Stage
rooms.Description:
As the bright lights beam down on you the show continues.  A variety of acts
come on and off of the stage as you make your way around.  To the south is
the house of the theater and backstage is to the west.

rooms.Name: The Stage
rooms.Description:
As the bright lights beam down on you the show continues.  A variety of acts
come on and off of the stage as you make your way around.  To the south is
the house of the theater and backstage is to the west.

rooms.Name: The Stage
rooms.Description:
As the bright lights beam down on you the show continues.  A variety of acts
come on and off of the stage as you make your way around.  To the south is
the house of the theater and backstage is to the west.

rooms.Name: The Stage
rooms.Description:
As the bright lights beam down on you the show continues.  A variety of acts
come on and off of the stage as you make your way around.  To the south is
the house of the theater and backstage is to the west.

rooms.Name: The Stage
rooms.Description:
As the bright lights beam down on you the show continues.  A variety of acts
come on and off of the stage as you make your way around.  To the south is
the house of the theater and backstage is to the west.

rooms.Name: Muppet Labratories
rooms.Description:
A black table sits in the center of the room with all sorts of glass test
tubes and beakers arrayed across it.  Inside the tubes strange colored
liquids are steaming and bubbeling.

rooms.Name: The News Set
rooms.Description:
As you enter you see a row of plain, black rimmed clocks lining the dull
yellow wall.  A small window can be seen, as with most news shows, but this
one has the picture of a cow in it.  The only other difference seems to be
the sound of a large object falling from above.

rooms.Name: Pigs In Space
rooms.Description:
From out of nowhere you suddenly hear the voice of an announcer yell, "
PIIIIGS IIIIN SPAAAAAAAAAACE!"  This set is covered with little lights and
buttons.  The walls have a silvery color which matches the uniforms of the
pigs.  Several pigs sit behind a central control counter talking to each
other.

rooms.Name: Backstage
rooms.Description:
Muppets are running in every direction in order to keep the show going
smoothly.  Sets are being brought on and off stage as the show moves along.
Several of the shows main sets are to the west and and the dressing rooms
are up a set of wooden stairs to the north.

rooms.Name: The Back Door
rooms.Description:
The only light in this corner comes from the blinking exit sign.  It is right
over a large metal door that has been proped open with a cinder block.  The
distant sound of a car traveling down a road can be heard.

rooms.Name: Veterinarian Hospital
rooms.Description:
You enter a clean room with a bright bowl shaped light pointing down onto
a table.  Surgival instruments have been carelessly left on a tray beside a
table here.

rooms.Name: The Swedish Chef's Kitchen
rooms.Description:
You are now in a small kitchen with a long white counter.  Knives and cooking
ingredients are scattered throught the room.  You realize that the chef might
be a little messy when he cooks.

rooms.Name: Backstage
rooms.Description:
Muppets are running back and forth getting ready for their next scene.
You notice the set of old wooden stairs here which lead up to the show's
dressing rooms.  You might actually run into some guest stars up there.

rooms.Name: An old wooden staircase
rooms.Description:
The stairs creak beneath your feet as you travel up them.  You can hear the
sounds of singing and of a chicken coming from above.

rooms.Name: A Dimly Lit Hallway
rooms.Description:
You enter a small hallway.  Over the railing you can see the backstage and
several of the sets which are used during the show.  You see several doors
which line the hallway.  In front of you is an open door with a star hanging
on it.

rooms.Name: A Dimly Lit Hallway
rooms.Description:
As you travel down the hallway you start to hear strange noises.  From the
north you hear what seems to be the sound of a chicken and from the west.
you can faintly hear someone singing.  You think it might just be your
imagination, but you never know.  In front of you is another open door
with a star on it.

rooms.Name: A Dimly Lit Hallway
rooms.Description:
The sound of the singing is much stronger now and appears to be coming from
the door which is to the north.  It is yet another door with a star painted
on it, but this one seems much nicer than the others.  The hallway continues
to the west.

rooms.Name: The End of the Hallway
rooms.Description:
As you come to the end of the hallway all becomes silent.  The room to the
north is quiet and dark.  The door is open and you wonder what is inside.
The only way out, besides the room, seems to be the hallway back to the
east.

rooms.Name: A Dark And Spooky Room
rooms.Description:
You see a candle opera on a dresser in the corner of the room.  There are
cobwebs everywhere and it is hard to see around the room.  You suddenly
realize that a person in the far corner has been watching you ever since
you entered the room.

rooms.Name: A Nice Dressing Room
rooms.Description:
The large dressing room you have entered is bright and well furnished.  The
mirror over the desk in the corner is surrounded by small lights.  There
appears to be no other exits than the door behind you.

rooms.Name: A Disorganized Dressing Room
rooms.Description:
The room before you has small white feathers scattered all over it.  It has
the usual desk with a mirror over it and lights surrounding the mirror.  The
paintings on the walls are crooked and the furniture looks to be fairly old.
The only visible exit is behind you.

rooms.Name: A Bright Dressing Room
rooms.Description:
A Large desk is in the corner with a mirror surrounded by lights. It is
covered with what seem to be love letters from a pig.  The room is painted
green and has a rack of costumes on the back wall.  The only exit seems to be
behind you.

rooms.Name: A Dead End
rooms.Description:
You come to the end of the street and realize that the only diraction to
go is back the way you came.  You look at the dark buildings surounding
you for a moment and then turn around.

rooms.Name: A Small Sidestreet
rooms.Description:
You stand in the middle of a street in a small town.  To the east you see
the back door entrance to an old theater.  To the south the street lights
are out and you can not see what is in that direction.  The the north the
street becomes wider and there are people traveling down it.

rooms.Name: A Street
rooms.Description:
You walk along the sidewalk now as the traffic picks up.  The road makes a
sharp turn here and merges with a small highway that heads off into the
country.

rooms.Name: The Highway
rooms.Description:
You come to a large orange sign sitting in the middle of the road.  On it,
in black letters, is printed 'ROAD CLOSED  BRIDGE OUT AHEAD'  You decide
that it is best to turn around and try the other direction.

rooms.Name: The Highway
rooms.Description:
You are now on a small, two lane highway.  It stretches for miles to the
east and west.  Over a small hill you can see the steeple of a church to
the northwest.

rooms.Name: The Highway
rooms.Description:
As you go over the small hill you see an exit to the highway.  There is a
very small town there with a restraunt and a car dealership.  The church
is now much larger and you can see an old bus parked outside of it.

rooms.Name: An Exit Ramp
rooms.Description:
The curve of the two lane exit-entrance ramp takes you to a small road.  To
the north is an old used car dealership and to the east is a small cafe.

rooms.Name: The Used Car Lot
rooms.Description:
Hundreds of old, beat up cars are sitting in this parking lot.  The pavement
is cracked and grass is slowly making its way through the holes.  You hurry
through the lot in hopes that you can avoid the dreaded used car salesman.

rooms.Name: The Used Car Lot
rooms.Description:
Hundreds of old, beat up cars are sitting in this parking lot.  The pavement
is cracked and grass is slowly making its way through the holes.  You hurry
through the lot in hopes that you can avoid the dreaded used car salesman.

rooms.Name: The Used Car Lot
rooms.Description:
Hundreds of old, beat up cars are sitting in this parking lot.  The pavement
is cracked and grass is slowly making its way through the holes.  You hurry
through the lot in hopes that you can avoid the dreaded used car salesman.

rooms.Name: The Used Car Lot
rooms.Description:
Hundreds of old, beat up cars are sitting in this parking lot.  The pavement
is cracked and grass is slowly making its way through the holes.  You hurry
through the lot in hopes that you can avoid the dreaded used car salesman.

rooms.Name: The Used Car Salesman's Office
rooms.Description:
You enter a warm office with a nice picture of the salesman on the back
wall.  The office is neat and will organized.  Here is where the salesman
tries to make you comfortable as he tries to unload his collection of
trashy cars.

rooms.Name: Frog's Legs Cafe
rooms.Description:
You enter a small diner with a counter and stills.  There are also several
booths and tables with customers sitting at them.  To the north waiters are
going in and out of the kitchen with food.

rooms.Name: The Kitchen
rooms.Description:
The large kitchen is full of waiters and cooks getting food ready for the
dinner crowd which is about to come in.  It looks as if some of the frogs
are trying to make a break for it and that they are trying to catch them.

rooms.Name: The Highway
rooms.Description:
As you continue down the highway you pass in front of a large wooden church.
The white paint on the church is slowly starting to fade and peel from the
weather and the steps in front show signs of wear.

rooms.Name: Inside The Church
rooms.Description:
You enter a medium sized colonial church.  It has white pews with red velvet
cussions.  The ceiling has high ceilings and the sound carries well in it.
To the north you see another set of pews and the alter beyond them.  To
the south is the exit.

rooms.Name: In The Back Corner Of The Church
rooms.Description:
Another row of pews is here.  The music starts as you make your way through
them.  To the north are more pews and then the alter.  To the west is the
other corner of the church.

rooms.Name: In The Front Of The Church
rooms.Description:
You see in front of you the alter and the choir loft.  The pulpit and the
lectern have been moved to the side of the church to make room for the
band which is accompanying the chior.

rooms.Name: In The Front Of The Church
rooms.Description:
You see in front of you the alter and the choir loft.  The pulpit and the
lectern have been moved to the side of the church to make room for the
band which is accompanying the chior.

rooms.Name: The Chior Loft
rooms.Description:
Rows of pews are used as the chior loft.  They rise several feet and allow
for the voices of the chior to project well in the large sanctuary.  To the
South is the sanctuary.

rooms.Name: The Chior Loft
rooms.Description:
Rows of pews are used as the chior loft.  They rise several feet and allow
for the voices of the choir to project well in the large sanctuary.  To the
South is the sanctuary.

rooms.Name: The Highway
rooms.Description:
The small highway begins to climb out of the small valley where the church
is located.  To the southwest a local bar can be seen and to the northeast is
a small colonail looking church.

rooms.Name: The Highway
rooms.Description:
As the highway continues its climb out of the valley it passes the local bar.
To the west vast fields of corn and livestock can be seen.  To the south is
the bar.

rooms.Name: A Bar
rooms.Description:
The bar has a large counter with all sorts of drinks on it.  People are moving
around the many tables set up to face the stage.  At the end of the bar a      
brown dog is playing the piano.  On stage a fuzzy bear attempts to tell jokes.

rooms.Name: The Stage
rooms.Description:
The large wooden stage has large lights which shine down on it.  The stage's
sound system barely makes up for the clatter and commotion going on around the
bar and the only thing which seems to quiet them down are the comedians bad
jokes.

rooms.Name: The Highway
rooms.Description:
You travel down the highway and come to the top of another small hill.  In t
the distance you can see a large city and you can also see what looks to be
a fire coming for somewhere ahead.  The Highway continues to the west.

rooms.Name: A Fork In The Road
rooms.Description:
Here the road splits off in two directions.  The road to the northwest
continues to go toward a large city and the smaller road to the southwest
heads toward the fire.

rooms.Name: A Road
rooms.Description:
This small gravel road dead ends into a small fire circle.  Here a fire is lit
and a great deal of socializing is going on.  The fields surrounding it
stretch for miles in every direction.  With the stars overhead it is a very
peacefull setting.

rooms.Name: The Fire Circle
rooms.Description:
You notice the soft glow of the fire as you slowly make your way around the
circle.  From above the stars brightly shine through the clear night sky.
All seems calm and peacefull.

rooms.Name: The Fire Circle
rooms.Description:
You notice the soft glow of the fire as you slowly make your way around the
circle.  From above the stars brightly shine through the clear night sky.
All seems calm and peacefull.

rooms.Name: The Fire Circle
rooms.Description:
You notice the soft glow of the fire as you slowly make your way around the
circle.  From above the stars brightly shine through the clear night sky.
All seems calm and peacefull.

rooms.Name: The Fire Circle
rooms.Description:
You notice the soft glow of the fire as you slowly make your way around the
circle.  From above the stars brightly shine through the clear night sky.
All seems calm and peacefull.

rooms.Name: The Highway
rooms.Description:
As you continue down the highway you notice that it is quite a ways to the
city.  The building that you are headed towards is now in sight.  It is the
tall office building of a famous movie industry.  Hopefully the director
will be able to meet with you.

rooms.Name: The Highway
rooms.Description:
As other cars start to appear on the road you realize that you are slowly
entering civilization.  The long grey highway continues on its way towards
the city as you wonder about what is in store for you ahead.

rooms.Name: The Highway
rooms.Description:
The heavy traffic and congested roads if a major city are now visible.  You
are much closer now and should be inside the city soon.  The cornfields and
farms are slowly turning into suburban developments.

rooms.Name: The Highway
rooms.Description:
Here the highway starts to enter the city.  More lanes open up and the
highway slowly starts to turn into a city street.  Around you tall buildings
rise and surround you.  People line the streets as they make their way back
from their afternoon lunch breaks.

rooms.Name: A Large City Street
rooms.Description:
As you look to the north you see that you are standing in front of the giant
office building of the movie company.  The huge class windows almost 
completely cover the front side of the building.  You hear the woosh of air
as a man in a suit makes his way through the revolving doors.

rooms.Name: The Lobby
rooms.Description:
The large ornate marble walls of the loby are quite remarkable.  You notice
that there are pictures of famous actors and directors hanging on the walls.
As you make your way through you ask the clerk at the desk which floor to go
too.  You are directed to the second floor.  Seeing the long line at the
elevator you decide it is better just to take the stairs.

rooms.Name: The Stairs
rooms.Description:
The musty smell of an enclosed set of stairs catches your nose as you enter
through the doorway.  In front of you an iron set of stairs ascends toward
the second floor.

rooms.Name: At The Top of The Stairs
rooms.Description:
You arrive at the top of a platform and see a door with the number two
painted on it.  You take a second to take a deep breath and walk into
the office.

rooms.Name: The Waiting Room
rooms.Description:
The nice blue color of the walls and the quiet music catch your attention as
you enter the room.  A row of chairs are along the north and south walls
of the room with a few people sitting in them.  To the north is the desk
of the directors receptionist and the door to his office.  You notice
that the receptionist has the key to his office in her hand.

rooms.Name: The Director's Office
rooms.Description:
You enter a large corner office with a huge wooden desk.  The walls are
covered with the pictures of famous actors and friends of the director.
There is a large leather chair behind the desk which is turned to face the
window.  As you enter the chair slowly turns around to face you.
